title: When you lose a game to a 2/8 yasuo
body: And then he thinks he's good, GG provs back down to B5 probs. I feel like shit. I honestly thought that provisionals would be a lot easier just like getting higher in bronze. Jesus was I wrong.

replies.body: That's probably because he had a better team and their team probably took more objectives than you guys did. Tbh score doesn't really matter. What matters is the objectives that you take. Like literally you can be 30/0/0 and still lose the game cause u were chasing the enemy jungler vi around your jungle while the other team was already taking your towers or other objectives like baron and dragon.
